metadata.dc:author: Marcote Icart, J
Canals Ruiz, P
Peris Beaufils, J L
López Català, F
metadata.dc:description: We performed a psychological profile study in 43 patients showing tinnitus as only symptom. We have employed two different questionnaires, EPI and STAI, to evaluate the state of neuroticism, extroversion and anxiety. The score of neuroticism and anxiety are very important in order to get and individual treatment.
metadata.dc:title: Importancia del perfil psicológico en el enfermo con acúfenos.
[The importance of psychological profile of patients with tinnitus].
